2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: After Hobson confronts Clark Kent regarding "the truth about Superman," his investigation takes him to Stryker's Prison, where he finds himself face-to-face with the Man of Steel's most fearsome foes!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Exposed, Part 2 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Final issue!!! Lock the doors and close the curtains, loyal readers. The time has come for The Last Vampirella Story. Who's telling it? Who's listening to it? And who saw it coming before anyone else? What will become of our beloved Vampirella, and her vast array of friends, foes, and family members? It's the end of the world as we know it...for now.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverFabiano Neves1
RegRegular CoverLucio Parrillo2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Last Vampirella Story

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The town of Brimstone is under siege by the forces of darkness, and Becky, Drake, and their allies are caught in the middle. In the midst of the chaos, Asher Cobb goes berserk! And not all of our heroes will not survive the night. We've always said that no one is safe. This issue proves it!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Not the Bullet, But the Fall, Part Three

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: When a new invention of Dilton's catches Mr. Lodge's eye, he's determined to pitch it to his business partners for millions. But will they like it, or will they think he doesn't have enough sense to come in from the rain? Find out in "When It Rains..." the lead story to this extra-sized double digest!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: When It Rains...

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
AND THE WINNER IS…

In the final matches of the Grand Magic Games, a wounded Erza struggles against a sadistic Minerva who can twist space itself, Gajeel sinks into the shadows against a powered-up Rogue, and Laxus faces down impossible odds against Jura, the world's fifth-strongest wizard. But as the Games end, the kingdom prepares for a day Natsu never thought he'd see: the return of the dragons!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Volume 38

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The epic Mega Man/Mega Man X crossover event continues in 'Dawn of X,' part 2! We travel one hundred years into Mega Man's future, where an ancient Wily weapon threatens all defenseless humans! It's up to X and Zero to combat the lumbering metal monstrosity! Meanwhile, Emerald Spears terrorist-on-the-run Xander Payne tumbles through time-and sees something that will change him forever! Featuring brand new cover art from Patrick 'Spaz' Spaziante and an extra special character-packed variant cover from Ben Bates!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverPat Spaziante1
VarVariant CoverBen Bates2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Dawn of X, Part 2: The Hunters and the Hunted

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The Dynamic Duo is trapped by a maniacal TV producer who plans to broadcast their final appearance on the air. Not even high ratings will help Batman and Robin!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Chapter Thirty-Eight

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Damon is trapped by the carnival’s ringleader, but the real danger comes from a source much closer to home.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Circus of Souls Part 2 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: 2013 Talent Hunt winners DEVON WONG and ISAAC GOODHART bring you the most shocking Darkness and Magdalena story ever told. Set in 1671 Mexico, the story "Through a Glass, Darkly" brings you the story that took place just before THE DARKNESS: BLACK SAILS.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Through a Glass, Darkly

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Old Hob has perfected the art of making mutants! With the ranks of his mutant gang swelling, the Turtles will have to determine if they can truly trust Hob against the Foot. Throw in Alopex’s return to New York and the mutant mayhem will only get crazier!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AMateus Santolouco1
BCover BKevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c)2
RIRetailer Incentive CoverBrahm Revel3
RERetailer Exclusive Cover - Alamo City Comic ConKevin Eastman4
While Terry, Bruce, and Barbara consider Rewire's demands, a bloodied and beaten Dick Grayson attempts to make his escape!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Alternating Currents, Part 2 of 4: Pattern Opposition

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The STAR TREK event of 2014 continues in Part 4 of “The Q Gambit!” Captain Kirk and the crew of the USS Enterprise find themselves in a true no-win scenario thanks to the mischievous Q! Trapped in a dark future, at the mercy of the mighty Dominion, this adventure might prove to be their last! Don't miss this all-new story produced in association with STAR TREK writer/producer Roberto Orci!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverTony Shasteen1
SubSubscription Photo Cover (Odo)Unlisted2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Q Gambit Part 4

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: SpongeBob has fallen under the spell of a comfy, snug sweater his gramma gave him--and now he's drinking tea, reading poetry, and…gasp, choke!…scrapbooking!? Can Patrick and Gary defeat the cozy menace? Find out in "The Sweater!" Also in this issue: The Goofy Goober live show goes horribly wrong; Patrick and SpongeBob have silly fun with their powers of regeneration; and a shipload of tough pirates debate SpongeBob trivia. All this plus SpongeFunnies by James Kochalka!

IN 6 MONTHS…TIME RUNS OUT!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverSimone Bianchi1
VarRocket Raccoon & Groot Themed Variant CoverChip Zdarsky2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Origin Sites

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
AXIS TIE-IN!

You heard right—since the events of AXIS inverted him...

DEADPOOL HAS GONE ZEN!

HE FOUND PEACE! HE SWORE OFF VIOLENCE!

So how is he going to help his friends live through the inverted X-Men?!?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: A Friend In Need...

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The refugees from Arkham Asylum think there’s safety in numbers - but not if one of them is Bane!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: I'll Scratch Your Back...

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Awaiting details...

Shhh! Do you know the secrets and tricks to getting the most out of CP? This mag will tell you! Master the mini games by playing puzzle challenges, protect the island from aliens and check out our latest comic strip about a high speed puffle sled race! All this and more, what are you waiting for? Waddle on to your newsagent today.
